item.title: Enforcement was considered discriminatory. Now New Yorkers can jaywalk legally
item.description: The NYPD can no longer ticket jaywalkers, after years of protest that enforcement unfairly targeted Black and Hispanic New Yorkers.

item.title: Documentary Film ‘Songs From the Hole’ Wins Incarcerated Jury Award at Sing Sing
item.description: The Marshall Project hosts the first-ever film festival at the historic New York prison.

item.title: Bird flu has been found in a pig for the first time in the U.S.
item.description: The discovery of an infected pig at a backyard farm in Oregon raises concerns about bird flu's potential to become a human threat.
